price: 13. Mpe akopesa bino biloko bisusu oyo bokolingaka mpe lisungi kowuta epai na Allah mpe elonga ya pembeni. Mpe pesa sango elamu epai ya bandimi.
arabic: وَأُخۡرَىٰ تُحِبُّونَهَاۖ نَصۡرٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَفَتۡحٞ قَرِيبٞۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-ukh'rā tuḥibbūnahā naṣrun mina al-lahi wafatḥun qarībun wabashiri al-mu'minīna
